basics.name: Jacob Elnaggar
basics.label: MD/PhD Candidate
basics.summary: MD/PhD candidate pursuing radiation oncology with a research focus on cancer biology and computational methods.

education.institution: Louisiana State University Health Sciences Center

work.name: MD Anderson Cancer Center
work.summary: Conducted translational microbiome and cancer research using molecular and computational methods in Dr. Lauren Colbert's lab.

volunteer.summary: Provided healthcare services to underserved populations in the New Orleans community.
Organized a donation drive and fundraiser raising over $2,000 and collecting multiple truckloads of supplies.
Volunteered at a shelter for individuals experiencing homelessness, assisting with repairs, meals, and coordination of student volunteers.
Counselor at a weeklong day camp for children with special needs, ensuring safety and engagement.
Hosted and guided medical school interviewees, representing LSUHSC to prospective students.
Trained peers and healthcare professional students in basic life support.

awards.title: Alpha Omega Alpha Honor Medical Society
awards.awarder: Inducted into AOA, recognized for excellence in academic performance, leadership, professionalism, and commitment to service

awards.title: ASTRO–Breast Cancer Research Foundation Medical Student Fellowship
awards.awarder: Awarded $2,000 award to attend the 2025 ASTRO Annual Meeting

awards.title: ASTRO-BCRF Radiation Oncology Visiting Away Rotation Scholarship
awards.awarder: $2,500 award to support a radiation oncology away rotation

awards.title: Chancellor’s Award
awards.awarder: Nominated by the LSU Health Sciences Center Department of Microbiology, Immunology, and Parasitology as the representative for the Chancellor's Award.

awards.title: Gordon Research Conference Scholarship (Lactic Acid Bacteria)
awards.awarder: Scholarship to attend Lactic Acid Bacteria Biology, Symbioses and Applications - Gordon Research Conference

awards.title: American STD Association (ASTDA) Small Project Assistance
awards.awarder: Competitive funding award to support PhD research on bacterial vaginosis.

awards.title: Stanley W. Watson Education Scholarship
awards.awarder: Scholarship to attend the Strategies and Techniques for Analyzing Microbial Population Structures (STAMPS)

awards.title: UAB Center for Clinical and Translational Science (CCTS) Mini-Sabbatical award
awards.awarder: Competitive funding award to attend IDSOG and STAMPS

awards.title: Infectious Diseases Society for Obstetrics and Gynecology (IDSOG) Travel Scholarship
awards.awarder: $1000 to attend the 2022 IDSOG Annual Meeting, Boston, MA

awards.title: Diversity Travel Scholarship
awards.awarder: Award to attned the 35th MD PhD Conference at University of Colorado, Denver
